description: CSV Output Configuration - Configurable output directory, full field CSV export, and summarized screen output mode

userStories.title: Add output configuration schema
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to define the output configuration schema so the system knows what settings are available.
acceptanceCriteria: Add `output` section to `config.json` with `csv` and `screen` subsections
userStories.notes: Implemented in output_config.py with OutputConfigValidator class and getter functions

userStories.title: Update ConfigValidator with output defaults
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the config validator to apply defaults for output settings so the application works without explicit configuration.
acceptanceCriteria: Add output section defaults to `DEFAULTS` in `config_validator.py`
Validate `output.csv.encoding` is a valid Python encoding
Validate `output.csv.directory` path can be created (no invalid characters)
userStories.notes: Implemented in config_validator.py with output defaults and validation methods. Added 18 new tests.
